10ef39b7-8d31-4354-b935-a764b04950c6.description: The badge earner has the foundational understanding of event-driven systems and the Solace PubSub+ Platform. With the hands-on activities, the earner has the knowledge to get started with the Event Portal, PubSub+ Event Brokers (Software & Cloud) and deploy an Event Mesh.
10ef39b7-8d31-4354-b935-a764b04950c6.name: Solace Certified Solutions Consultant

badge_template_activities.title: Take the Solace Certified Solutions Consultant self-paced learning path.
Successfully pass the certification exam with a minimum score of 70%.
Solace Certified Solutions Consultant (SCSC) Exam Guide

c4a4fac0-f4ac-4bf4-9860-fe0cbe18a0bd.description: The badge earner has the foundational understanding of event-driven architecture (EDA), best practices associated with event-driven methodology, and how to apply them both to their applications and infrastructure as a whole. With the hands-on activities, the earner has the knowledge to get started with the Event Portal, to design and document event driven applications, events and event flows.
c4a4fac0-f4ac-4bf4-9860-fe0cbe18a0bd.name: Solace Certified Event Driven Architecture Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Register here for the EDA Practitioner Certification path.
Successfully pass the certification exam with a minimum score of 70%.

64092708-40c7-4774-88e4-93780487a43e.description: The badge earner has the foundational understanding of event-driven architecture (EDA), PubSub+ Platform, and developing applications for PubSub+ Event Brokers. With the hands-on activities, the earner has the knowledge to get started developing applications using either Solace PubSub+ API or open APIs/Protocols supported by Solace.
64092708-40c7-4774-88e4-93780487a43e.name: Solace Certified Developer Practitioner (Level 1)

badge_template_activities.title: Register here for the Solace Certified Developer Practitioner Path
Successfully pass the certification exam with a minimum score of 70%.

2c04f6b4-d556-45ea-8bc0-78d647bc58b2.description: Earning Solace Certified Event Broker Administrator Associate certification validates the skills and knowledge into the operational management of Solace products, and how to configure and administer various features for applications that leverage Solace messaging.
2c04f6b4-d556-45ea-8bc0-78d647bc58b2.name: Solace Certified Event Broker Administrator Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Take the Solace Certified Event Broker Administrator self-paced learning path.
Successfully pass the certification exam with a minimum score of 70%.
Solace Certified Event Broker Administrator (SCEBA) Exam Guide

df4d1148-4be5-4984-aa41-2f5439731eb0.description: The badge earner has successfully completed the Solace PubSub+ Cloud Development & Administration instructor-led course. The course provides an introduction into operational management of PubSub+ Cloud products, and how to configure & administer various features for applications which leverage Solace messaging. In this course, you also learn how to develop applications using one of the PubSub+ APIs.
df4d1148-4be5-4984-aa41-2f5439731eb0.name: Solace PubSub+ Cloud Development & Administration ILT Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the instructor-led Solace PubSub+ Cloud Development & Administration course
Successfully pass the end of course exam with a minimum score of 70%.

97ff6c4c-810c-4880-a8d5-dace289224ea.description: The badge earner has the understanding of event-driven integrations (EDI) with PubSub+ Platform. The exam validates an architect’s knowledge required to event-enable an organization’s integration infrastructure with PubSub+ Platform.
97ff6c4c-810c-4880-a8d5-dace289224ea.name: Solace Certified Event Driven Integration Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Register here for the Solace Certified Event Driven Integration Associate Path
Successfully pass the certification exam with a minimum score of 70%.
